attributes.additional_details: Recently the pre-release in geography was revealed, enclosing the damage of deforestation. The irony is simply unsympathetic.  The number of worksheets was appalling. As a geography student, I learn about the threat which deforestation proposes on the environment. Yet as we discuss this, teachers hand out a surplus of sheets.
attributes.background: Schools rely heavily on the production of sheets. However, as active students trying to reduce our impact on climate change, we demand this is reduced.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of your school and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233982
